title: Google conducting civil rights review, caving to years of pressure
description: Advocacy groups have long called on the tech giant to follow companies like Meta and Apple and vet its products for racial biases.

title: Four ways you’re making your home WiFi worse (and how to fix it)
description: Don't shove the router in a corner and other mistakes that might be making your home internet worse.

title: Amazon says it is pausing construction at HQ2 in Arlington
description: The move adds delays to a multiyear plan to bring 25,000 employees to its new offices in Northern Virginia as it cuts jobs elsewhere in the country.

title: A 10-year-old wrote a score. Musicians around the world are performing it.
description: Ten-year-old Olive Wallace’s score went viral on TikTok, prompting musicians across the world to perform her medieval-style composition.

title: Why are China’s tech leaders still disappearing if the crackdown is over?
description: Chinese tech banker Bao Fan is "assisting the government." Alibaba founder Jack Ma hops from country to country. Is China's tech crackdown really over?
